alert.note: Alert for Broward (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 13 at 9:13PM EDT until April 14 at 12:15AM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM EDT FRIDAY... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall. * WHERE...A portion of South Florida, including the following county, Broward. * WHEN...Until 800 AM EDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Historic rainfall has occurred in the Fort Lauderdale metro area the past 36 hours. Despite the heavy rain coming to an end this evening, numerous roads remain closed due to flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 910 PM EDT, local law enforcement reported heavy rain in the warned area due to thunderstorms. Flooding is ongoing. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Fort Lauderdale, Pembroke Pines, Hollywood, Davie, Plantation, Sunrise, Tamarac, Lauderhill, Oakland Park, Lauderdale Lakes, Dania Beach, Cooper City, Wilton Manors, Lazy Lake, Broadview Park, Melrose Park, Chula Vista, St. George, Washington Park and Nova Southeastern University. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
